name: ANDREA PESCI
brieflyMe:
Hi! I'm Andrea, a game programmer from Milan, Italy, passionate about games since I was 5. I started learning Unreal Engine in late 2023, after using Godot and GDScript for a while.
Previously, after earning a degree in Computer Science, I worked as a software developer for many years, during which I had the chance to refine my skills in C++, C#, and Python. Soon after, I became a Project Lead Developer, where I had the opportunity to collaborate with different teams in an Agile environment. This experience allowed me to learn various Scrum software and practices.

Here, you can see some of the projects I've worked on during this period. I always strive to polish my work to achieve the best possible results, and I'm never afraid to take on new challenges or learn new things.

If you've read this far, I would love to get in touch with you, so feel free to contact me in any way you prefer! And as always, keep gaming!
